title: Patch Notes
content:
a bug on split screen causing the inventory context menu on another player's item to get stuck temporarily. Fixed a bug where the in-game custom dice UI would require you to press controller buttons twice instead of once to navigate through them. Fixed a split screen bug where Player 1 would become invisible from Player 2's perspective if Player 2 disconnected from the session while in a cinematic. Fixed some overlapping button prompts on the Report UI in the Mod Manager.

Added a Memorial Port
